snippet: China has agreed to let United States regulators observe corporate audits of Chinese companies listed on American stock exchanges.
abstract: China has agreed to let United States regulators observe corporate audits of Chinese companies listed on American stock exchanges.
lead_paragraph: China has agreed to let United States regulators observe corporate audits of Chinese companies listed on American stock exchanges.

headline.main: U.S. Reaches Auditing Deal With China
headline.print_headline: U.S. Reaches Auditing Deal With China
